content: diamonds in the round 8 afghan motif © 2006 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern worsted weight yarn crochet hook size j gauge 4 double_crochet = 5/8 1 row = 5/8 chain 5 join with slip_stitch to form ring round 1 chain 3 15 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 round 2 chain 3 * double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st 5-double_crochet popcorn in next st double_crochet in next st repeat from * around end with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 round 3 chain 3 4 double_crochet in same space for popcorn double_crochet in next st * 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next space double_crochet in next st popcorn in next st double_crochet in top of last row popcorn popcorn repeat from * around end last repeat with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2d chain 2 2 double_crochet in next space * double_crochet in next 3 sts double_crochet in top of popcorn popcorn in next st double_crochet in top of next popcorn double_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * around end with slip_stitch in top of popcorn round 5 chain 3 double_crochet in next 5 sts * 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next space double_crochet in next 6 sts double_crochet in top of popcorn double_crochet in next 6 sts repeat from * around end with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 round 6 chain 3 double_crochet in next 7 sts * 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next space double_crochet in next 17 sts repeat from * around end with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 round 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet in next 9 sts * 4 half_double_crochet in next space half_double_crochet in next 21 sts repeat from * around fasten yarn and weave in ends
